### April 18, 2021

```{r map, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
library(htmltools)
places <- data.frame(Placename = c("Elderslie", "Guelph", "Vancouver", "Riverside", "Saskatoon", "Dorval", "Pointe-Claire"),
lat = c(44.310605,	43.531844,	49.26481,	33.981357,	52.124891,	45.446694,	45.445004),
lng = c(-81.185082, -80.223875, -123.251016, -117.330579, -106.642271, -73.759371, -73.8131068),
when = c("1948-1966", "1966-1969", "1969-1973", "1973-1975", "1975-1985", "1986-1992", "1992-2021"))

places %>% leaflet() %>%   addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup = ~htmlEscape(when), clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
